entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Drizzle, 1.5°C

Visibility: 4.8 km

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain or drizzle ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Monday 16 May 2016
